title: Tributes pour in for the late Paul Walker's birthday
text:
On what would have been her father Paul Walker's 46th birthday, Meadow Walker penned a heartfelt message on Instagram Thursday.

Accompanied with a throwback image of her and her dad, Meadow wrote, "Happy birthday to the loveliest soul I’ll ever know."

Meadow's message comes along with a slew of other tributes, including from Walker's brother Cody.

"I love you and miss you everyday. You left your mark on the world and we only want to make you proud. Your legacy lives on brother. Happy birthday Pdub," he wrote.

Walker's "Fast & Furious" co-star Vin Diesel also shared a message about how much their time together onset meant to him.

"So much to tell you... so much to share... ," Diesel wrote, along with a pic of him in front of a pic of Walker.

He added details on all the new "Furious" cast members and how Walker would love the new on-screen family Diesel now has.

"John Cena was there, who you would just love. His gratitude is palpable... and knowing you, you would just want him to win," he wrote.

He then turned the message to what it means to not have his best friend here on what would be a very special day.

"Normally today I would be planning how to embarrass you with a birthday cake. Haha. Instead I reflect on how lucky I am to call you my brother. The tears never go away, but they change... from that of mourning to that of grace. We only hope to make you proud," he added.

In fact, Diesel wrote that he and Meadow connected on this important day.

"Guess what message I woke up to... your daughter. Meadow sending me love on this day. Wow, she knows me so well. She has your heart. Happy birthday... it’s amazing, but somehow you continue to make the world a better place," he closed.

Cody Walker, Paul's Brother, and Meadow both commented with heart emojis after the touching tribute.
description: On what would have been her father Paul Walker's 46th birthday, Meadow Walker penned a heartfelt message on Instagram Thursday.
